author: Noemie Bisserbe
title: Gunman Takes Hostages in France in Possible Terrorist Attack - WSJ
text:
TRÈBES, France—A gunman demanding the release of the only surviving suspect of the 2015 Paris terrorist attacks killed three people Friday in a supermarket assault in southern France before he was shot dead by police.
The attack, the latest in a string across Europe in recent years, is a test of Emmanuel Macron’s young presidency, as authorities grapples with lone-wolf attackers organizing smaller scale assaults.
